Music

Recorded and Mixed by Bogbody
Mastered by Waldo Wittenmeyer
Album Artwork by Herald Baloo

About

Bogbody is Wesley Maffly-Kipp, Zane Frisch, Ray Flynt, and Gianni Sarmiento.

Begun as the songwriting project of Wesley Maffly-Kipp, Bogbody brings you the best in thoughtful and emotive guitar rock.
